traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The aldani can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The aldani makes two attacks with its claws.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 5 (1d8 + 1 damage) slashing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 11). The aldani has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.
